name: Thai Mango Dipping Sauce Recipe (Nam Pla Wan)
description: This Thai mango dipping sauce recipe for nam pla wan makes a tangy and sweet flavorful dip that's perfect for fresh fruits, especially unripe green mangoes.

video.name: Mango with dipping sauce, yummy! ðŸ˜œ #thaifood #mango #fruity #dippingsauce #tiktokthailand

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a cooking pot over medium heat and add water, palm sugar, shrimp paste, fish sauce, chopped chilies, shallots, dried shrimp, and dried chili flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a cooking pot over medium heat and add water, palm sugar, shrimp paste, fish sauce, chopped chilies, shallots, dried shrimp, and dried chili flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir until all ingredients blend together, close the lid and boil for 5 minutes. Then transfer your nam pla wan to a serving cup of your choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir until all ingredients blend together, close the lid and boil for 5 minutes. Then transfer your nam pla wan to a serving cup of your choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel green mangoes using a vegetable peeler and slice them into thin slices. Transfer sliced mangoes to a cup filled with cold water to keep them fresh. Dip and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Peel green mangoes using a vegetable peeler and slice them into thin slices. Transfer sliced mangoes to a cup filled with cold water to keep them fresh. Dip and enjoy!

keywords: mango dipping sauce, nam pla wan
